org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport
Class TCPNotificationListenConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport.Connection
      org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport.TCPNotificationListenConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class TCPNotificationListenConnection
extends Connection
implements java.lang.Runnable

A TCPConnection establishes socket-based communication link. However, multiple client requests can come into the same port and, consequently, into the same ServerSocket. Client connection requests are queued at the port, so the server must accept the connections sequentially. However, the server can service them simultaneously through the use of threads - one thread per each client connection.

Author:
Dijana Micijevic, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2003/04, Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
